abstract: Samantha Stosur defeats Kristina Mladenovic to win Strasbourg International tennis tournament; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Stosur rallied to beat Kristina Mladenovic, 3-6, 6-2, 6-3, in the final of the Strasbourg International, claiming her first title of the year.

headline.main: Samantha Stosur Rallies to Win at Strasbourg International

snippet: Stosur rallied to beat Kristina Mladenovic, 3-6, 6-2, 6-3, in the final of the Strasbourg International, claiming her first title of the year.
